comments: Creates a user reason. This user action reason cannot be used when actioning a user until this call completes
successfully. Anytime after that the user action reason can be used.

params.name: userActionReasonId
comments: (Optional) The Id for the user action reason. If not provided a secure random UUID will be generated.

params.name: request
comments: The request object that contains all of the information used to create the user action reason.
